example_quotes: Energy's pretty much the same, just really complaining a lot about the throat.
Have you taken a look into his throat? Is it red? Do you see any yellow streaking white stuff, anything like that?
I don't know if I saw any white or yellow streaks, but definitely looks very red in there.
OK, how about his bowel movements? Have those been normal?
Yeah, they've been normal. No diarrhea or constipation.
Chest pain?
No.
My child has been having a sore throat and chills yesterday as well.
And is he having any issues swallowing food or fluids?
Have any confusion or memory loss?
No, not that I know.
OK, how about his bowel movements? Have those been normal?
Yeah, they've been normal. No diarrhea or constipation.
OK, coughing?
No, hasn't been coughing at all
OK, how about his bowel movements? Have those been normal?
Yeah, they've been normal. No diarrhea or constipation.
OK, dizziness or fainting spells?
No.
And is he having any issues swallowing food or fluids?
Yeah, it seems like appetite's gone down, like a lot of pain in his throat, especially when swallowing solid foods.
OK, um, and how about shortness of breath or wheezing?
No, nothing like that.
OK, do his tonsils look enlarged?
Uh, everything looks swollen in there, I don't know what's what, but it does look very angry in there.
Have you taken a look into his throat? Is it red?
I definitely did take a look yesterday and definitely saw a lot of redness.
OK, dizziness or fainting spells?
No.
OK. And, any fatigue or exhaustion?
Energy's pretty much the same, just really complaining a lot about the throat.
Have you taken his temperature at home?
No, I think he might have had a fever yesterday, but we didn't really take a temperature.
Headaches?
He was complaining of a headache a few days ago, but it kind of went away on its own.
OK, how about changes in vision or hearing?
No.
Any appetite changes?
Yeah, just with the trouble swallowing I'm trying to make sure that he gets like liquids because over the last few days he can't tolerate like solid foods at all.
Have any confusion or memory loss?
No, not that I know.
OK, do his tonsils look enlarged?
Uh, everything looks swollen in there, I don't know what's what, but it does look very angry in there.
OK, how about in nausea or vomiting?
No, no, he hasn't told me anything about that.
Yeah, it seems like appetite's gone down, like a lot of pain in his throat, especially when swallowing solid foods.
Feeling like his heart is racing?
No.
OK, has he had a stuffy nose or runny nose?
No, not really, no.
Any loss of taste or smell?
No, nothing like that.
My child has been having a sore throat and chills yesterday as well.
And is he having any issues swallowing food or fluids?
OK, ok have you noticed any swelling in in the neck area?
Uhm, I think there might be like a few lumps near his neck, so I don't know if that's swelling, but definitely there is.

No, nothing like that.
how about a weight loss over the past few weeks?
No, not really. It's just been over the last few days that he hasn't been eating like himself.

No.

No, no, he hasn't told me anything about that.

No, nothing like that.
